entry.title: CTV Meeting #5 Agenda (Tuesday, March 7th, 12:00 PT)
entry.summary: On March 8th, there was a CTV meeting scheduled at noon PT with an agenda that included updates and discussions on various topics related to Bitcoin development. The first item on the agenda was a Sapio Taproot support update and request for review, which involved experimental support for Taproot merged on master. The second topic of discussion was Transaction Sponsoring v.s CPFP/RBF, which referred to two different methods of confirming transactions on the blockchain. The third topic was Jamesob's Non-Recursive Vaults Post, which discussed potential improvements to the security of Bitcoin wallets. The fourth item on the agenda was a broad discussion of recent developments in the Bitcoin community, including acronyms such as EVICT, TLUV, FOLD, Lisp, OP_ANNEX, Drivechain Covenants, and Jets. Finally, the meeting ended with a Q&A session.
